SourceProxy.name: ProcessIds
SourceProxy.label: Process Ids

Documentation.long_help: This filter generate point and cell data containing the current process id of each point and cell.

SourceProxy.Documentation: GenerateProcessIds is meant to fill in the ProcessIds attribute array, to know which processor owns which cells and points. It can generate it for both PointData and CellData. The ProcessIds array's name will be "PointProcessIds" for PointData, and "CellProcessIds" for CellData.

IntVectorProperty.name: GeneratePointData
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The value of this property determines whether to generate process id for points.

IntVectorProperty.name: GenerateCellData
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The value of this property determines whether to generate process id for cells.

SourceProxy.name: GenerateProcessIds
SourceProxy.Deprecated: This has been replaced by 'ProcessIds'. Please consider using that instead.
